snippet.title: The Directorate: Novitiate Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
The Directorate: Novitiate is coming to Steam Early Access! 

Launching in Steam Early Access in 2025 
Wishlist on Steam! http://thedirectorate.games/steam

Become Mercury, a newcomer to the magical, criminal world of the Syndicates in this thrilling third-person Action RPG. Fight supernatural threats, track a serial killer across Los Angeles, and choose sides as war breaks loose."
